sentences.en: A “do what I say, not what I do” world economy will fracture, to the detriment of all.
sentences.cn: 在一个“依我所言，勿仿我行”的世界里，世界经济将割裂分化，伤害所有的国家。

sentences.en: An incident like this cannot happen again without detriment to our business relations.
sentences.cn: 象这样的事件如再发生就必然损害我们的业务关系.

sentences.en: Every part of the structure which can be saved without detriment will be saved.
sentences.cn: 可以节省的部分,如果不因节省而发生后害,将被节省掉.

sentences.en: Foreign banks, began to locate major branches in London to the detriment of the clearing banks.
sentences.cn: 外国银行为了与英国清算银行竞争, 开始在伦敦设置主要分行.

sentences.en: Governments which ignore them, however, do so to their own detriment.
sentences.cn: 然而，政府忽略这些因素就是损害自己的利益。

sentences.en: He sits up very late to the detriment of his health.
sentences.cn: 他常常熬夜,这对他的健康不利.

sentences.en: He sits up very late, to the detriment of his health.
He smoked a lot, to the detriment of his health.
sentences.cn: 他抽烟很多, 对健康造成损害.

sentences.en: He works far into the night to the detriment of his health.
sentences.cn: 他常常工作到深夜,这对他的健康不利.

sentences.en: His lack of education be a serious detriment to his career.
sentences.cn: 他的未受教育对他的事业是一种严重的妨碍.

sentences.en: Nor is the detriment only to the US industry .
sentences.cn: 受到损害的不仅仅是美国轮胎行业。

sentences.en: Occasional questions arise as to the yield benefit or detriment of removing the bud of soybeans.
sentences.cn: 摘除大豆顶芽会出现对产量有利或不利的临时性问题.

sentences.en: Smoking is a detriment to one's health.
The fact that they can do everything in synch shouldn't be a detriment to them.
sentences.cn: 从他们的脸上你会认识到他们无所不能,坚不可摧.

sentences.en: These difficulties have been overcome without detriment to performance.
sentences.cn: 这些困难都已在不影响业绩的情况下得到了克服。

sentences.en: This tax cannot be introduced without detriment to the economy.
sentences.cn: 这一税制一旦施行,必然会危害国民经济.

sentences.en: We have over - relied on psychology, to our detriment.
sentences.cn: 我们己太过于依赖于心理学来帮助我们决策.

sentences.en: We should study all these subjects equally well and not stress English to the detriment of the rest.
sentences.cn: 这几门功课都要学好,不能只偏重英语.

sentences.en: Work hard to succeed but not to the detriment of others.
sentences.cn: 在不损害他人利益的前提下为成功艰苦奋斗。

words.tran_cn: 有害的人（或物）；不受欢迎的求婚者
